author: donaldp
msg: Rework the way "verbose" output is emitted to match that as emitted in 1.4.6

Buildr differs in it's interpretation of this flag from Rake in the interpretation of the unset state. Unset the flag indicates non-verbose output from file tasks but verbose output from buildr tasks.
